== Nediyiruppu (627455) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Nediyiruppu is a village in the [[Ernad]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 2020 hectares and harbouring 5676 households with total population of 30462 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Manjeri]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 14859 and female population is 15603. Scheduled Caste Population is 4135 and Scheduled Tribes population is 35. Census Location Code of the village is 627455<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 24847 (81.57%)
* Literate male population: 12305 (82.81%)
* Literate female population: 12542 (80.38%)
